definitions.definition: The smallest possible amount, quantity, or degree.
examples: With minimal effort, you won't be able to achieve all your dreams.

subdefinitions.definition: Among elements of some collection , such that no other element is greater (with respect to some given partial order ).
examples: With respect to the ordering induced by set-theoretic inclusion, the power set of the set of natural numbers has a unique minimal element: the empty set.

definitions.definition: Characterised by the use of simple form or structures.
Characterised by the repetition and gradual alteration of short phrases.

main_definition: The smallest possible amount, quantity, or degree.
secondary_definitions: ( art ) Characterised by the use of simple form or structures.
( music ) Characterised by the repetition and gradual alteration of short phrases.
